plugins.name: gleif-egf-knowledge
plugins.description: Pre-synthesized SKOS knowledge base for the GLEIF vLEI Ecosystem Governance Framework. Contains 42 concepts covering KERI infrastructure, vLEI credentials, roles and representatives, trust assurance, and ecosystem governance. Includes a gleif-expert subagent for context-isolated queries.
